title: No, This Viral Video of Man Beating His Son is Not From India
subtitle: The video of man beating his child is being circulated on social media websites with the message that encourage people to forward it to all the Indians and also across the world so that the man gets arrested.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video has been going viral on social media that shows a man hanging a child upside down from a window and thrashing him mercilessly. The video is being circulated on social media websites with the message that encourage people to forward it to all the Indians and also across the world so that the man gets arrested.

The text message that accompanies that video says, "Contribute your bit in spreading this video in every corner of India and the world. I have done my bit. And you cannot even think how big a job you are doing. Very soon this bastard should be arrested."
